name: 6th BREFM at KYOTO, JAPAN International Conference on Business, Economics, Finance and Management
content: The 6th International Conference on Business, Economics, Finance and Management will be held in Kyoto, Japan from March 27-29, 2024\. The theme of this conference is "Smart City and Green Life." BREFM brings together researchers, scholars, and practitioners from around the world to discuss and exchange ideas on various topics related to business, economics, finance, and management. This year, the conference's main theme is "SMART CITY AND GREEN LIFE". The theme reflects the growing concern for sustainable development and the need to address environmental issues. The conference aims to explore how the latest developments in technology and management practices can be leveraged to create sustainable and environmentally friendly urban spaces.
